data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernández, F., Delabie, J. H. C., do Nascimento, I. C. (2009): Diaphoromyrma, a new myrmicine ant genus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from North Eastern Brazil. Zootaxa 2204: 52-62, URL: http://hol.osu.edu/reference-full.html?id=22817
